name: MyT1D
description: A mobile application to help type 1 diabetic patients manage their diabetes easier.

name: Replit CLI
description: A CLI application to connect to Replit.

name: Replit Oauth
description: An unofficial third-party oauth imitation for Replit.

name: SearchDeck
description: A search engine compiler. Collects results from 4 different search engines and smartly compiles them onto one page.

name: Token Revoker
description: A discord bot that continuously scans the server for leaked discord bot tokens and slack tokens and automatically revokes them.

name: Reflux Marketplace
description: The marketplace for the popular Replit theming extension, Reflux.
